problem_data.title: Partition to K Equal Sum Subsets
problem_data.description: Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return true if it is possible to divide this array into k non-empty subsets whose sums are all equal.

examples.explanation: It is possible to divide it into 4 subsets (5), (1, 4), (2,3), (2,3) with equal sums.

experiment_result.runlog:
[測試#1] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: canPartitionKSubsets([5, 4, 3, 3, 2, 2, 1], 4)
  標準輸出: True
  你的輸出: True

[測試#2] ✅ 通過
